title: Teamcubation - The first company that trains software developers

team.description: WHAT AND WHO MAKE US THE FIRST COMPANY IN DEVELOPERS TRAINING MARKET

carousel.text_1: “We lose opportunities due to lack of people”
carousel.text_3: “We have half the team we need”

descriptive_legend.line_2: READY TO WORK EXPERTS WHILE THEY DEVELOP

section_2.text: Teamcubation is the bridge between education and work. we want to contribute to solve the digital senior talent shortage by incubating junior development teams to take on more senior roles.

section_3.text_1: With the surge of digital careers and coding schools, there are plenty of tech professionals with lots of potential and yet not enough experience. Finding and transforming them into rounded and experienced professionals takes effort, money, but most of all time and dedication.
section_3.text_2: Teamcubation hacks the experience challenge, by providing an opportunity for people who would otherwise not make it to the pipeline. In only 6 months, we onboard and train the new batch of junior programmers, whilst working on one or more projects of your backlog. In turn, the senior devs in your organization can focus on the delivery of your key projects and as a bonus, we ease up a little bit the work of your hiring team.

1.text: We seek to understand your organization’s way of working by learning your technology stack, methodologies and culture.

2.text: We pull together a squad between your junior devs and 1 senior dev and 1 scrum lead of ours. This team will work together for 6 months developing a project in your backlog powered by PEP (our proprietary software used to customize the training to each person's needs). PEP stands for Programming Experience Platform but most importantly for PEP Guardiola! During this period we have several demos with your organization to ensure the project is aligned to your needs.

3.text: The junior devs have acquired more seniority and are ready to take on projects of greater responsibility in your organization. Because all this time they have worked according to the info gathered in the initial assessment, interacted with your teams and even worked from your offices, they understand your company's processes and culture and are ready to hit the ground running.

options.organization: I'm an organization that wishes to incorporate Junior developers
options.senior: I'm a Senior developer and I want to mentor Junior developers
options.junior: I'm a Junior/Trainee developer with coding knowledge
options.no-exp: I don't know how to code and I want to learn

searches.text_left: Take a look at our open positions_

carousel.text_1: “I know a lot about the technology, but I don't get the chance to lead teams”
carousel.text_2: “I want to be the Senior that I would have loved next to me when I was a Junior”
carousel.text_3: “How can I have 4 years of experience if I learnt it 2 years ago!”
carousel.text_4: “It's impossible to have 20 years of experience in Docker when it came out in 2013!”

section_2.text: WE ARE THE COMPANY THAT TEACHES YOU TO TRANSFORM JUNIORS INTO READY TO WORK PEOPLE. If you see beyond software, beyond the framework and you understand the key is in in the people, join Teamcubation: learn how to lead teams, while you develop for big companies and share with others what you know.

section_3.text_1: Organizations ask for senior developers, but the market only has juniors. How do we achieve the transformation from one to the other?
section_3.text_2: Teamcubation takes care of breaking the loop of lack of experience transforming novice developers in a cohesive and efficient team ready to give the best of themselves to the company that hired them. And you will be the on in charge of this transformation.

1.text: Welcome home. In Teamcubation you won't only learn new technologies, but also to lead teams, teach, mentor and lead a squad of developers.

2.text: If you are Senior Squad Member, you will focus in understanding the tech stak of the organization: what do they do? with what frameworks? If are a Squad Leader, you will focus in the organization's culture: what methodologies do they use?, how do they do it?

3.text: We assign you a project, a Squad, and during six month you commit to accelerate the transformation of junior developers into seniors, with the help of our proprietary software of learning analytics, Programming Experience Platform (PEP) which, combined with your mentoring and experience will allow us to detect the areas that need more attention for each of the rookies.

carousel.text_2: “Now I do have the opportunity to work in the place of my dreams”
carousel.text_3: “Without Junior Devs there are no Senior Devs”
carousel.text_4: “The place where I finished my tech education”

descriptive_legend.line_2: HOLD YOUR HAND DEVELOPING A REAL PROJECT
descriptive_legend.line_3: FOR THE COMPANY THAT HIRED YOU

section_2.text: WE ARE A TIME MACHINE AND WE HELP YOU TO GET 2-YEARS EXPERIENCE IN 6 MONTHS. The time machine exists. Hi, we are Teamcubation.

section_3.text_1: We are the missing bridge between the programming education world and the digital industry.
section_3.text_2: In other words: we transform a junior in a “ready to work” developer, a Padawan into a Jedi, a Pelé into a Maradona. We make you gain experience in a transparent and fun environment, with good people, that know how to code, but even better, know how to teach.

1.text: Are you ready to time travel and do in six months what others do in 2 years? We'll assign you a Squad, where you will immerse in the methodologies and technologies, and you will develop a software for your organization.

2.text: Code. Code. A lot of code. Code like you've never done it. You'll get to know interesting people and have fun acquiring the abilities that the organization that hired you needs. And remember: it's not only about coding, we'll also teach you communication and leadership skills.

3.text: We've learned to love you, but every bird has to go their family's nest. You came as a junior, today you are an experienced developer inside an organization. Make us proud and hold Teamcubation's name up high!

carousel.text_2: “Now I do have the opportunity to work in the place of my dreams”
carousel.text_3: “Without Junior Devs there are no Senior Devs”
carousel.text_4: “The place where I finished my tech education”

descriptive_legend.line_1: WE SOLVE THE LACK OF TALENT
descriptive_legend.line_2: AND FIRST JOB SEARCH USING DATA,
descriptive_legend.line_3: ALLOWING THE HIRE OF INEXPERIENCED PEOPLE

section_2.text: After several years in the industry and the academy we feel there is a missing piece that links both worlds. The problem is clear and visible, we form a lot of people in tech but companies still have a lack of talent to meet their needs

section_3.text_1: We are a team with several years of experience in the digital industry

1.text: ¿Listo para viajar en el tiempo y hacer en seis meses lo que a cualquier otra persona le tomaría dos años? Te asignaremos a un Squad, donde te empaparás de las metodologías y tecnologías y desarrollarás un proyecto en la organización de la que eres parte.

2.text: Código. Código. Mucho código. Código como nunca. Conocerás gente interesante y te divertirás adquiriendo las habilidades laborales que necesita la organización que te contrató. Y recuerda: no se trata solo de aprender skills de código, también te enseñaremos habilidad de comunicación y liderazgo.

3.text: Nos hemos encariñado, pero todo pájaro debe ir a vivir al nido de su familia. Llegaste siendo un junior, hoy ya eres un developer experimentado dentro de una gran organización. ¡Haznos sentir orgullosos y lleva el nombre de Teamcubation en alto!
